title: Need help setting up channels for fire stick tv
creator: cgrant1

title: Hiding and unhiding tabs
content: Firefox has started hiding all tabs in a window except the active tab. This has happened in two different windows. I have no idea how to hide tabs and don't want to. How can I unhide the tabs. When I try to do it one by one, the first tab rehides when the 2nd one appears. Can I unhide multiple tabs at once? Do I have to unhide them one by one, and if so how? How do I stop Firefox from hiding tabs?
creator: mbxls

title: HISTORY column with my data (vertical) located on side under toolbar was deleted by FIREFOX.  Want this set-up back.  View is as in opening emails...all folders on left in vertical, not on TOOLBAR .  It's not displaying all history.
content:
my vertical column HISTORY under the toolbar has been deleted by FIREFOX. Want all data in History on the right be displayed on left always visible when opening FIREFOX.

This is FIREFOX'S error; fix it.

title: Add ways to donate with Alipay
content: I tried to donate to Mozilla, but the only few donation methods were not that convenient. Is it possible to use Alipay to make donations in the future?
creator: enderman_how

title: Leaving comments on others' blogspots
content:
I have a blogspot website that I can sign into.

Sometimes, when I try to leave a comment on the blogspot of other individuals, I get the following message:

"Unable to sign in to comment. Please check your browser configurations to allow sign-in. Learn more. To leave a comment, click the button below to sign in with Google."

The "button below" doesn't work.

Note: this only happens with some blogspot accounts. There are other blogspot accounts that I am able to leave comments.
creator: GeorgeNJ
